scripts.build:demo: npm run clean && parcel build docs/_docs/floorplan/demo.html
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && parcel build src/index.ts --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:no-minify: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && parcel build src/index.ts --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:docs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/components/floorplan-examples/floorplan-examples.ts --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --out-dir docs/_docs/floorplan --out-file floorplan-examples --public-url ./
scripts.update:docs: docker run -it --rm --volume=${PWD}/docs:/srv/jekyll -p 4000:4000 jekyll/jekyll bundle update github-pages
